span.p:
Skip storage
No WAL entry
No memory formed

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Batch by project + task + time window

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Flush when batch_window (2min)
or max_batch_size (10) reached

span.p:
epsilon (prediction error)
Scalar or batch tensor

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
novelty (embedding distance)
Scalar or batch tensor

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
reward signal
Scalar or batch tensor

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
MemoryGate (heuristic)
Weighted scoring:
novelty(0.25) + outcome(0.25) +
entity(0.20) + action(0.15) + time(0.15)
Pattern matching: always_store / never_store

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
LearnedMemoryGate (Bayesian)
Online Bayesian logistic regression
Thompson sampling for exploration
247-dim feature vector
Cold start: blends with heuristic gate
Updates on task outcome feedback

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TemporalGate (differentiable)
nn.Module with learnable lambdas
Trained via surrogate gradient
Used in spiking cortical stack
